author: AP
title: 'Dreary summer' expected in California as virus dims plans
description: Summertime in California won’t look the same
content: LOS ANGELES (AP) — In these dark times, clouded by fears of an enemy we can’t see and sheltered in homes we’re itching to leave, it’s reassuring to know that California’s sunsets over the Pacific are just as vivid. You just can’t enjoy them with sand between … [+4612 chars]
